        }
        
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $this->timeout);
        curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, $this->connect_timeout);
        
        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILE, $this->read_stream);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
            if ($this->registered_streaming_read_callback) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_read_callback']);
            }
        }
        
        if ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILE, $this->write_stream);
        } elseif ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_write_callback']);
        }
        
        if ($this->curlopts) {
            foreach ($this->curlopts as $opt => $value) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, $opt, $value);
            }
        }
        
        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle = null, string $response = null) {
        if (!$curl_handle) {
            $curl_handle = $this->curl_handle;
        }
        
        if (!$response) {
            $response = curl_exec($curl_handle);
        }
        
        $this->response = $response;
        
        $header_size = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE);
        $this->response_headers = substr($response, 0, $header_size);
        $this->response_body = substr($response, $header_size);
        
        $this->response_code = curl_getinfo($curl_handle, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        
        $headers = explode("\r\n", $this->response_headers);
        $parsed_headers = [];
        foreach ($headers as $header) {
            if (strpos($header, ':') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(':', $header, 2);
                $parsed_headers[trim($key)] = trim($value);
            }
        }
        $this->response_headers = $parsed_headers;
        
        return $this->response;
    }

    public function send_request(bool $parse = false) {
        $this->prep_request();
        $response = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        
        if ($parse) {
            $this->process_response($this->curl_handle, $response);
            return $this;
        }
        
        return $response;
    }

    public function send_multi_request(array $handles, array $opt = null) {
        $multi_handle = curl_multi_init();
        $channel_map = [];
        
        foreach ($handles as $handle) {
            $ch = $handle->prep_request();
            curl_multi_add_handle($multi_handle, $ch);
            $channel_map[(int)$ch] = $handle;
        }
        
        $running = null;
        do {
            curl_multi_exec($multi_handle, $running);
        } while ($running);
        
        $results = [];
        foreach ($channel_map as $ch => $handle) {
            $response = curl_multi_getcontent($ch);
            $handle->process_response($ch, $response);
            curl_multi_remove_handle($multi_handle, $ch);
            $results[] = $handle;
        }
        
        curl_multi_close($multi_handle);
        return $results;
    }
}

<?php
class BCS_RequestCore {
    private $request_url;
    private $request_headers = [];
    private $request_body;
    private $response;
    private $response_headers = [];
    private $response_body;
    private $response_code;
    private $response_info;
    private $curl_handle;
    private $method = 'GET';
    private $proxy;
    private $username;
    private $password;
    private $curlopts = [];
    private $debug_mode = false;
    private $request_class;
    private $response_class;
    private $useragent = 'BCS_RequestCore/1.0';
    private $read_file;
    private $read_stream;
    private $read_stream_size;
    private $read_stream_read = 0;
    private $write_file;
    private $write_stream;
    private $seek_position;
    private $registered_streaming_read_callback;
    private $registered_streaming_write_callback;

    public function __construct($url = null, $proxy = null, $helpers = null) {
        if ($url) $this->set_request_url($url);
        if ($proxy) $this->set_proxy($proxy);
        if (is_array($helpers)) {
            if (isset($helpers['request'])) $this->request_class = $helpers['request'];
            if (isset($helpers['response'])) $this->response_class = $helpers['response'];
        }
    }

    public function __destruct() {
        if (is_resource($this->read_stream)) fclose($this->read_stream);
        if (is_resource($this->write_stream)) fclose($this->write_stream);
        if (is_resource($this->curl_handle)) curl_close($this->curl_handle);
    }

    public function set_credentials($user, $pass) {
        $this->username = $user;
        $this->password = $pass;
        return $this;
    }

    public function add_header($key, $value) {
        $this->request_headers[$key] = $value;
        return $this;
    }

    public function remove_header($key) {
        unset($this->request_headers[$key]);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_method($method) {
        $allowed = ['GET', 'POST', 'PUT', 'DELETE', 'HEAD'];
        if (in_array(strtoupper($method), $allowed)) {
            $this->method = strtoupper($method);
        }
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_useragent($ua) {
        $this->useragent = $ua;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_body($body) {
        $this->request_body = $body;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_request_url($url) {
        $this->request_url = $url;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_curlopts(array $curlopts) {
        $this->curlopts = array_merge($this->curlopts, $curlopts);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream_size($size) {
        $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_stream($resource, $size = null) {
        $this->read_stream = $resource;
        if ($size !== null) $this->read_stream_size = $size;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_read_file($location) {
        $this->read_file = $location;
        $this->read_stream = fopen($location, 'r');
        $this->read_stream_size = filesize($location);
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_stream($resource) {
        $this->write_stream = $resource;
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_write_file($location) {
        $this->write_file = $location;
        $this->write_stream = fopen($location, 'w');
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_proxy($proxy) {
        $this->proxy = is_array($proxy) ? $proxy : ['http' => $proxy];
        return $this;
    }

    public function set_seek_position($position) {
        $this->seek_position = $position;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_read_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_read_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function register_streaming_write_callback($callback) {
        $this->registered_streaming_write_callback = $callback;
        return $this;
    }

    public function streaming_read_callback($curl_handle, $file_handle, $length) {
        if ($this->seek_position !== null && $this->read_stream_read < $this->seek_position) {
            fseek($file_handle, $this->seek_position);
            $this->read_stream_read = $this->seek_position;
        }

        $remaining = $this->read_stream_size - $this->read_stream_read;
        $to_read = min($length, $remaining);
        
        if ($to_read <= 0) return '';
        
        $data = fread($file_handle, $to_read);
        $this->read_stream_read += strlen($data);
        return $data;
    }

    public function streaming_write_callback($curl_handle, $data) {
        if ($this->write_stream) {
            fwrite($this->write_stream, $data);
        } else {
            $this->response_body .= $data;
        }
        return strlen($data);
    }

    public function prep_request() {
        $this->curl_handle = curl_init();
        
        curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, [
            CURLOPT_URL => $this->request_url,
            CURLOPT_HEADER => true,
            CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
            CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
            CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 5,
            CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
            CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => $this->method,
            CURLOPT_USERAGENT => $this->useragent,
            CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array_map(fn($k, $v) => "$k: $v", array_keys($this->request_headers), $this->request_headers)
        ]);

        if ($this->method === 'POST' || $this->method === 'PUT') {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->request_body);
        }

        if ($this->username && $this->password) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_USERPWD, "$this->username:$this->password");
        }

        if ($this->proxy) {
            foreach ($this->proxy as $type => $url) {
                curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, constant("CURLOPT_".strtoupper($type)."_PROXY"), $url);
            }
        }

        if ($this->read_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_READFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_read_callback']);
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_INFILESIZE, $this->read_stream_size);
        }

        if ($this->registered_streaming_write_callback) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, $this->registered_streaming_write_callback);
        } elseif ($this->write_stream) {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILE, $this->write_stream);
        } else {
            curl_setopt($this->curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, [$this, 'streaming_write_callback']);
        }

        curl_setopt_array($this->curl_handle, $this->curlopts);
        
        return $this->curl_handle;
    }

    public function process_response($curl_handle, $response = null) {
        $this->response_info = curl_getinfo($curl_handle);
        $this->response_code = (int)$this->response_info['http_code'];
        
        if ($response === null) {
            $response = curl_multi_getcontent($curl_handle);
        }
        
        $this->response = $response;
        
        list($headers, $body) = explode("\r\n\r\n", $response, 2);
        $this->response_body = $body;
        
        $header_lines = explode("\r\n", $headers);
        $this->response_headers = [];
        
        foreach ($header_lines as $line) {
            if (strpos($line, ': ') !== false) {
                list($key, $value) = explode(': ', $line, 2);
                $this->response_headers[strtolower($key)] = $value;
            }
        }
        
        return $this;
    }

    public function send_request($parse = true) {
        if (!$this->request_url) throw new Exception("Request URL not set");
        
        $this->prep_request();
        
        $result = curl_exec($this->curl_handle);
        if ($parse) {
            $this->process_response($this->curl_handle, $result);
        }
        
        if ($result === false) {
            throw new Exception("cURL Error: " . curl_error($this->curl_handle));
        }
        
        return $parse ? $this->response_body : $result;
    }

    public function isBaeEnv() {
        return isset($_SERVER['HTTP_BAE_ENV']) && $_SERVER['HTTP_BAE_ENV'] === 'bae';
    }

    public function get_response_header($header = null) {
        if ($header === null) return $this->response_headers;
        return $this->response_headers[strtolower($header)] ?? null;
    }

    public function get_response_body() {
        return $this->response_body;
    }

    public function get_response_code() {
        return $this->response_code;
    }
}
?>
